00032 CText::CText()
00033 {
00034         // default constructor
00035         m_pHistory=(TIplText*) malloc(sizeof(TIplText));
00036         k_InitText(m_pHistory);
00037         m_InternalTIplText=true;
00038 }
00039 
00040 CText::CText(TIplText* pHistory)
00041 {
00042         if (pHistory!=NULL)
00043         {
00044                 m_pHistory=pHistory;
00045                 m_InternalTIplText=false;
00046                 return;
00047         }
00048         else
00049         {
00050                 ostringstream ost;
00051                 ost << "CText::CText(TIplText* pHistory) pHistory is a NULL-pointer" << IPLAddFileAndLine;
00052                 CError::ShowMessage(IPL_ERROR,ost.str().c_str());
00053         }
00054 }
00055 
00056 CText::~CText()
00057 {
00058         // default destructor
00059         if (m_InternalTIplText==true)
00060         {
00061                 if (m_pHistory!=NULL)
00062                 {
00063                         k_EmptyText(m_pHistory);
00064                         free(m_pHistory);
00065                 }
00066         }
00067 }
00068 
00069 CText& CText::operator=(const CText& SourceHistory)
00070 {
00071         k_CopyText(m_pHistory,SourceHistory.m_pHistory);
00072         return *this;
00073 }

00075 bool CText::SetTextPtr(TIplText* pHistory)
00076 {
00077         if (pHistory==NULL)
00078         {
00079                 return false;
00080         }
00081         m_pHistory=pHistory;
00082         return true;
00083 }

00085 TIplText* CText::GetTextPtr() const

00090 bool CText::Append(const string& str)
00091 {
00092         bool returnValue=k_AppendText(m_pHistory,str.c_str());
00093         if (returnValue==false)
00094         {
00095                 ostringstream ost;
00096                 ost << "CText::Append() Append failed" << IPLAddFileAndLine;
00097                 CError::ShowMessage(IPL_ERROR,ost.str().c_str());
00098         }
00099         return returnValue;
00100 }

00114 bool CText::AppendIPL(const char* pCharArray)
00115 {
00116         if (pCharArray==NULL)
00117         {
00118                 ostringstream ost;
00119                 ost << "CText::AppendIPL(const char* pCharArray) Append failed, pCharArray is a NULL pointer" << IPLAddFileAndLine;
00120                 CError::ShowMessage(IPL_ERROR,ost.str().c_str());
00121                 return false;
00122         }
00123         bool returnValue=k_AppendTextIPL(m_pHistory,pCharArray);
00124         if (returnValue==false)
00125         {
00126                 ostringstream ost;
00127                 ost << "CText::AppendIPL() Append failed" << IPLAddFileAndLine;
00128                 CError::ShowMessage(IPL_ERROR,ost.str().c_str());
00129         }
00130         return returnValue;
00131 }

00145 bool CText::Find(const string& str, string& Result)
00146 {
00147         TString InternalResult;
00148         k_InitString(&InternalResult);
00149         if (k_FindText(m_pHistory,str.c_str(),&InternalResult)==true)
00150         {
00151                 /* copy internal TString representation to a C++ std string */
00152                 Result.assign(InternalResult.pChars);
00153                 k_EmptyString(&InternalResult);
00154                 return true;
00155         }
00156         else
00157         {
00158                 k_EmptyString(&InternalResult);
00159                 return false;
00160         }
00161 }
00162 
00163 
00164 bool CText::FindNext(string& Result)
00165 {
00166         TString InternalResult;
00167         k_InitString(&InternalResult);
00168         bool returnValue=k_FindNextText(m_pHistory,&InternalResult);
00169         if (m_pHistory->SearchStr.NumberOfChars==0)
00170         {
00171                 ostringstream ost;
00172                 ost << "CText::FindNext() No search string present - call Find() first!" << IPLAddFileAndLine;
00173                 CError::ShowMessage(IPL_ERROR,ost.str().c_str());
00174             k_EmptyString(&InternalResult);
00175                 return false;
00176         }
00177         else
00178         {
00179                 /* copy internal TString representation to a C++ std string */
00180                 Result.assign(InternalResult.pChars);
00181                 k_EmptyString(&InternalResult);
00182                 return returnValue;
00183         }
00184 }
00185 
00186 
00187 bool CText::GetItem(unsigned long Index,string& Result) const
00188 {
00189         TString InternalResult;
00190         k_InitString(&InternalResult);
00191         bool returnValue=k_GetItemText(m_pHistory,Index,&InternalResult);
00192         if (returnValue==false)
00193         {
00194                 ostringstream ost;
00195                 ost << "CText::GetItem() Failed!" << IPLAddFileAndLine;
00196                 CError::ShowMessage(IPL_ERROR,ost.str().c_str());
00197         }
00198         else
00199         {
00200                 /* copy internal TString representation to a C++ std string */
00201                 Result.assign(InternalResult.pChars);
00202                 k_EmptyString(&InternalResult);
00203         }
00204         return returnValue;
00205 }

00280 ostream& operator<<(ostream& s,CText& Txt)
00281 {
00282         TIplText* pText=Txt.m_pHistory;
00283         unsigned int count;
00284         cout << "**************** CText info ********************" << endl;
00285         for(count=0;count<pText->NumberOfLines;count++)
00286         {
00287                 cout << "line " << count << ": " << pText->pStringList[count].pChars;
00288         }
00289         cout << endl;
00290 
00291         return s;
00292 }
